note.p: If SP2 or Oracle errors occur (SP2-*, ORA-*) then the job is terminated abnormally. The exit code is set to 98.

note.title: stderr channel not empty
note.p: If the stderr channnel ist not empty then the exit code is set to 99.

note.title: Job return code
note.p: The return code of the process is provided with the value of this return variable. The return code is zero if the process complets without errors.
